name: ATC: British Airways A320 Beautiful Buzzsaw Departure from London Heathrow
description:
A beautiful buzzsaw departure from London Heathrow onboard British Airways Airbus A320 G-EUUU operating flight BA1396 to Manchester on January 18 2017.

We were treated to fantastic views as we climbed out of runway 27L at Heathrow on this beautiful clear winter's day.

Full flight video: https://youtu.be/h8Sylv-P09o

PLEASE SUBSCRIBE FOR WEEKLY FULL FLIGHTSMY CAMERA GEAR: https://www.amazon.com/shop/inflightvideo

PATREON: http://patreon.com/inflightvideo

Airline:  British Airways
Flight:  BA1396 (callsign "Shuttle 2 Papa")
Aircraft:  Airbus A320 G-EUUU
From:  London Heathrow (LHR)
To:  Manchester (MAN)
Departure:  15:28
Arrival:  15:58
Flight Time:  0:30
Seat:  2F
Flight Path:  https://goo.gl/bNNN0n
